PTD Launcher was created in response to the limitations and poor performance of browser-based emulation.
With this tool, you can play two titles simultaneously, allowing you to farm in one while progressing through the story in the other, optimizing your gaming experience to the fullest.

## ⭐ Key Features
- ✅ Play two games simultaneously without browser restrictions.
- ✅ Better 🚀 performance and ☯ stability in emulating all Pokémon Tower Defense games.
- ✅ Open-source and continuously improving. 

#### If you like PTD Launcher, support the project on GitHub with a ⭐️. Every contribution motivates us to keep optimizing and adding new improvements.

## Comparison
| Using  `Chrome` | Using  `PTD Launcher` |

## Tutorials
### 🔎 How to Improve Adobe Flash Projector Performance
| 1. Right-click ➡️ on your favorite game |
| --- |
| <div align="center"><img src="/assets/tutorial_1.png" width="370" /></div> |
Select  `Settings...`

| 2. Uncheck `Enable hardware acceleration` |
| --- |
| <div align="center"><img src="/assets/tutorial_2.png" width="370" /></div> |
Select  `Close ` after ensuring
